name: Tiny Toon Adventures: Buster and the Beanstalk
name_original: Tiny Toon Adventures: Buster and the Beanstalk
description:
Tiny Toon Adventures: Buster and the Beanstalk is a family adventure game developed by Terraglyph Interactive Studios. It came out on 09-04-1996. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Tiny Toon Adventures: Buster and the Beanstalk on PC.
